verses.verse: My <S%G3450><s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> of <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> the Lord of <S%G1391>glory,<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> respect of <S%G4382>persons.<s%>

Are ye not then <S%G1252>partial<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2923>judges<s%> of <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1261>thoughts?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> have <S%G818>despised<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4434>poor.<s%> Do <S%G3756>not<s%> rich <S%G4145>men<s%> <S%G2616>oppress<s%> <S%G5216>you,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1670>draw<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>before<s%> the judgment <S%G2922>seats?<s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye have respect to <S%G4380>persons,<s%> ye <S%G2038>commit<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> and are <S%G1651>convinced<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G3848>transgressors.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3748>whosoever<s%> shall <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> yet <S%G4417>offend<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> point, he <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G1777>guilty<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he that <S%G2036>said,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2532>also,<s%> Do <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill.<s%> <S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> thou commit no <S%G3431>adultery,<s%> <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1161>yet<s%> if thou <S%G5407>kill,<s%> thou art <S%G1096>become<s%> a <S%G3848>transgressor<s%> of the <S%G3551>law.<s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> ye, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> they that shall <S%G3195>be<s%> <S%G2919>judged<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty.<s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he shall have <S%G2920>judgment<s%> without <S%G448>mercy,<s%> that hath <S%G4160>showed<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G1656>mercy;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1656>mercy<s%> rejoiceth <S%G2620>against<s%> <S%G2920>judgment.<s%>

Even <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G4102>faith,<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> it <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2041>works,<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3498>dead,<s%> being <S%G2596>alone.<s%> <S%G1438><s%>
